${ModID}:SwordAndDagger.NAME: Sword and Dagger
${ModID}:SwordAndDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Shiv to your hand.
${ModID}:SwordAndDagger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Shivs to your hand.

${ModID}:PrismaticBarrier.NAME: Prismatic Barrier
${ModID}:PrismaticBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you've played a ${ModID}:different color card this turn, gain !M! *Plated *Armor and Exhaust.

${ModID}:GrabBag.NAME: Grab Bag
${ModID}:GrabBag.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random ${ModID}:different color cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.
